references: H. Hadwiger and P. Mani, On polyhedra with extremal Euler characteristic, J. Combin. Theory, A 17 (1974), 345-349.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: Numbers suggest that for n>3, a(n) = C(n, [n/2])-1 if (n mod 4)=0 or 1 and C(n, [n/2]-1)-1 otherwise. - _Ralf Stephan_, Jun 07 2005
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
